
```{r}
library(caret)
Regular <- read.csv("cleaned_data_v1.csv") 
Regular$Success <- as.integer(Regular$Y) 
y <- Regular$Success
```



```{r}
set.seed(100)
trctrl <- trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10, savePredictions=TRUE)
nb_fit <- train(factor(Success) ~deltaOEFF + deltaDEFF + 0, data = Regular, method = "naive_bayes", trControl=trctrl, tuneLength = 0)
nb_fit
```
